means: （不顾困难地）促成某事( contrive的现在分词 )
巧妙地策划，精巧地制造（如机器）

sentence.Network_en: The oil companies were accused of contriving a shortage of gasoline to justify price increases.
sentence.Network_cn: 石油公司被控故意制造石油短缺以名正言顺地提高油价。

sentence.Network_en: Why may not several Deities combine in contriving and framing a world?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么不可能是数个神联合起来,设计和构造世界 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: The notorious drug - pusher has been contriving an escape from the prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 臭名昭著的大毒枭一直都在图谋越狱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: elementary research to the function of contriving experiment in physical of middle school ., 设计型实验在中学物理教学中的作用初探.

list.abs: ...e container or package of any kind 可移动的容器或任何类别的包装物movable contrivance 可移动装置movable weight 可移动的定量重物
Most poor nations , living very hard , create contrivance , this road , they walk ., 多数贫穷国家 , 生活十分艰苦 , 创造发明 , 这条道路 , 他们走.
they contrived new kind of machine .他们设计了新种类的机器。
this contrivance of the spectre of the spheres ., 这人间的魅影.

entry.def: If you contrive an event or situation, you succeed in making it happen, often by tricking someone.

example.ex: The oil companies were accused of  contriving a shortage of gasoline to justify price increases.
example.tran: 石油公司被控故意制造石油短缺以名正言顺地提高油价。

entry.tran: 发明;(精巧地)设计出，制造
entry.def: If you contrive something such as a device or piece of equipment, you invent and construct it in a clever or unusual way.

example.ex: We therefore had to contrive a very large black-out curtain.
example.tran: 因此我们得制作一块很大的遮光窗帘。

entry.def: If you contrive to do something difficult, you succeed in doing it.

example.ex: The orchestra contrived to produce some of its best playing for years.
example.tran: 这支管弦乐队呈现了精彩的演奏，堪称其多年来的巅峰演奏。

entry.tran: (用欺骗的手法)策划，图谋，设法做到
entry.def: When someone has done something dishonestly, you can say that they have contrived to do it.

example.ex: They somehow contrived to lose tens of thousands of applications.
example.tran: 他们精心策划故意遗失了数万份申请书。

auth_sentence.content: Scheming and planning and contriving how to get your property back.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scheming and planning and contriving how to get your property back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Scheming and planning and contriving how to get your property back.

auth_sentence.content: That my son's palpable enjoyment is the main reason, of course, for contriving and enacting these adventures.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That my son's palpable enjoyment is the main reason, of course, for contriving and enacting these adventures.
